name: M13PDFKit
summary: M13PDFKit is an iBooks like PDF viewer that can be embedded in iOS applications.
description: M13PDFKit is based off of vfr/Reader. The backend uses the same classes that Reader uses, the front end has been recreated to match iOS 8's design, and use more up to date features, like UICollectionViews.
